system.descriptor: Diagnosing and treating injuries and disease, performing first aid or extended care, as well as long-term treatments. Identifying, Creating, and Applying Chemicals.
system.uses:
First Aid: +0 Medicae Test, -10 if Patient Heavily Damaged, or -10 per point of Crit Dmg. If Successful, remove Int Bonus Damage, +1 per DoS. Use once per 24 Hours per Target that is not undergoing Extended Care.
Extended Care: Treat Int Bonus Patients, -10 per Patient Beyond this. Every 24 hours make +10 Medicae Test, if successful, remove 2x damage patient normally would at natural rates, +1 per DoS, +1 per Consecutive Day of Extended Care. If Fail, DoF Patients (starting with most injured) make +0 Toughness Test or suffer 1 Dmaage per DoF that ignores Armour/Toughness. If this causes Crit Damage, patient dies.
system.useTime: Full Action or More for complex problems
